cause.description:
We need to help find Louie Urso who has been missing from LaSalle/Windsor Ontario since Friday June 29, 2007. He was last seen in the morning and there has been no sign of him since...he was driving a 2006 BMW 525i and that was found on Tuesday July 3, 2007 locked and the alarm on...we need to find Louie Urso he is a kind and wonderful man...if anyone has seen him or know what's happened to him please contact LaSalle or Windsor police.
1. Very Close Family Friend
2. Needs to come home because this is not like him at all
3. He is a wonderful kind man that everyone loves
cause.name: Louie Urso Missing
